00036 #include <speechproc.h>
00037 
00038 SpeechProc newSpeechProc( REAL K, REAL MaxCompression, COMPLEX * spdat,
00039                           int size )
00040 {
00041     SpeechProc sp = ( SpeechProc ) safealloc( 1, sizeof( speech_proc ),
00042                                               "new speech processor" );
00043 
00044     sp->CG = newRLB( size + 1, NULL, "CG buffer in Speech Processor" );
00045     sp->K = K;
00046     sp->MaxGain = ( REAL ) pow( 10.0, MaxCompression * 0.05 );
00047     sp->fac =
00048         ( REAL ) ( ( ( ( 0.0000401002 * MaxCompression ) -
00049                        0.0032093390 ) * MaxCompression +
00050                      0.0612862687 ) * MaxCompression + 0.9759745718 );
00051     sp->LastCG = 1.0;
00052     sp->SpeechProcessorBuffer =
00053         newCXB( size, spdat, "speech processor data" );
00054     sp->size = size;
00055     return sp;
00056 }
00057 
00058 void delSpeechProc( SpeechProc sp )
00059 {
00060     if ( sp )
00061     {
00062         delRLB( sp->CG );
00063         delCXB( sp->SpeechProcessorBuffer );
00064         safefree( ( char * ) sp );
00065     }
00066 }
00067 
00068 void SpeechProcessor( SpeechProc sp )
00069 {
00070     int i;
00071     REAL r = 0.0,
00072         Mag;
00073 
00074     if ( sp->MaxGain == 1.0 )
00075         return;
00076     // K was 0.4 in VB version, this value is better, perhaps due to filters that follow?
00077     for ( i = 0; i < sp->size; i++ )
00078         r = max( r, Cmag( CXBdata( sp->SpeechProcessorBuffer, i ) ) );  // find the peak magnitude value in the sample buffer 
00079 
00080     RLBdata( sp->CG, 0 ) = sp->LastCG;  // restore from last time
00081     for ( i = 1; i <= sp->size; i++ )
00082     {
00083         Mag = Cmag( CXBdata( sp->SpeechProcessorBuffer, i - 1 ) );
00084         if ( Mag != 0.0 )
00085         {
00086             RLBdata( sp->CG, i ) = RLBdata( sp->CG, i - 1 ) * ( 1 - sp->K ) + ( sp->K * r / Mag );  // Frerking's formula
00087             if ( RLBdata( sp->CG, i ) > sp->MaxGain )
00088                 RLBdata( sp->CG, i ) = sp->MaxGain;
00089         }
00090         else
00091             RLBdata( sp->CG, i ) = sp->MaxGain;
00092     }
00093     sp->LastCG = RLBdata( sp->CG, sp->size );   // save for next time 
00094 
00095     for ( i = 0; i < sp->size; i++ )    // multiply each sample by its gain constant 
00096         CXBdata( sp->SpeechProcessorBuffer, i ) =
00097             Cscl( CXBdata( sp->SpeechProcessorBuffer, i ),
00098                   ( REAL ) ( RLBdata( sp->CG, i ) /
00099                              ( sp->fac * pow( sp->MaxGain, 0.25 ) ) ) );
00100 }
